TextView.android:text:
--> Civil Engg.

 ★ Prof. Braja Mohan Das - ( 1963 B.Tech) Dean Emeritus, College of Engineering and Computer Science, California State University, Sacramento, California, USA, VSSUT Best Alumnus Award-2014.

★ Er. Sudhakar Patri, (1969, B.Tech.), Ex-Chief Engineer, Water Resources Dept, Govt. of Odisha.

 ★ Er. Nalini Ranjan Pradhan - EIC cum Works Secretary, Govt of Odisha and Member of Board of Management, VSSUT.

★ Prof. Pradeep Behera, (1987, B.Tech.)Professor and Chair, Department of Civil Engineering, University of the District of Columbia, USA.

 --> Electronics and Teleco. Engg.

 ★ Prof. Ganapati Panda ( 1972, B.Tech.) -Ex-Dy Director, IIT Bhubaneswar.

 ★ Prof. Sagar Naik, (1980 B.Tech.) Professor, Dept .of Electrical and Comp. Engg., University of Waterloo, Canada

 ★ Prof. Rabi N. Mahapatra- (1979 B.Tech.), Professor, Dept. of Comp. Sc. and Engg., Texas A and M University, USA.

 ★ Dr. Binay Kumar Das - ( 1979 B.Tech.) - Director, ITR, Balasore, DRDO

 ★ Dr. Sanjay Burman ( 1985 B.Tech. ) - Director, CAIR, DRDO, Bangalore and Recipient of Scientist of the Year Award from Honorable Prime Minister of India. Member of Board of Management, VSSUT.

 ★ Syam Sundar Pattnaik ( 1992, PhD Electronic Enng.), Vice-Chancelllor, Biju Pattanaik University of Technology, Rourkela.

 --> Electrical Engg.

 ★ Er. S.B. Nayak, (1968, B.Tech.) - Ex-President(Tech.), Vedanta and Ex-Director, NALCO.

 ★ Prof. J.K. Satapathy(1976, B.Tech. ) Ex-Vice Chancellor, BPUT Rourkela.

 ★ Er. Prasant K. Pradhan ( 1977, B.Tech.) - CEO, WESCO, Odisha

 ★ Prof. C.R. Tripathy(1983, B.Tech. ) Vice-Chancellor, Sambalpur University, Burla.

 ★ Er. Sanjay Mishra (1990, B.Tech.) Author and Principal PM Manager at Microsoft, Redmond, USA

. ★ Er. Jagadish Mahapatra(1993, B.Tech. )-Managing Director for India and SAARC at McAfee, Mumbai, India.

 --> Mechanical Engg.

 ★ Late Ajit Mahaptra ( 1961, B.Tech.) - Ex-CMD Kalinga Engineers Ltd.

 ★ Prof. Aswini K. Mohanty (1962, B.Tech.) -Ex-Dy. Director, IIT Kharagpur.

 ★ Er. Banbir Das ( 1965, B.Tech.) - Ex-Addl. D.G, Ministry of Defence, Govt. of India.

 ★ Mihir K. Mohanty (1965, B.Tech) - Ex-Vice-President, ACC, Mumbai

 ★ R.P. Panigrahi (1967, B.Tech.) - General Manager, OCL, Rajgangpur

 ★ Prof. Krushna Chandra. Singh ( 1969, B.Tech.) - Ex-Principal, UCE Burla

 ★ Prof. Brajabandhu Pradhan (1970, B.Tech.) - Ex-Principal, UCE Burla.

 ★ S.S. Mohanty ( 1977, B.Tech.) - Director(Technical), SAIL, New Delhi

 --> Prof. Krishna Dev Kumar, Professor and Canada Research Chair in Space Systems, Department of Aerospace Engineering, Ryerson University, Canada

 --> Er. Naren K. Sahoo, Inventor of ST micro

 --> Er. Arup Nanda, (1991, B.Tech) Principal Database Architect at Starwood Hotels and Resorts Worldwide, Inc..USA Awarded the Enterprise Architect of the Year by Oracle.
